review: Spawned Walked for 1 f*cking long hour to find a friend, turns out I was in a different town.DayZ is a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game with ♥♥♥♥♥♥ comunitty, I payd 26 Euros for an early acces ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game wich zambies get trough walls I think in 2100 Dayz will get out of the early acess.
This game is great excelent graphics(on ultra high) good storyline good gameplay.I give this game 10/10 and I dont regreat a penny that I spent on this game
